reviewText: I was very happy with this movie. Good plot and a twist at the end. I admit I only bought it be use Kim Coates was in it. And he is actually in it to the end. But I liked it enough that I have watched it several times. If you are a Kim Coates fan you should get it.

Federal Agent Kate Parker(Erika Eleniak) arrives in a small rural town to extradite Claire Scott, a young woman suspected of murdering a government scientist. Kate is prevented from delivering her prisoner as the mysterious John Lawson, a rouge agent, now selling classified information on the black market, wants what Claire has - a deadly biological formula.

Claire, unaware that she has it, proclaims her innocence, and together with Kate, must escape from Lawson and his 2 seasoned assassins Mr. and Mrs. Jones(Stacy Keach and Erin Gray).

Harry Eden, a CIA operative and Kate's former lover, is dropped into the equation to help Kate but ultimately might lead to her demise as a deadly game of cat-and-mouse is played to its extreme.
